product_name: Merrell Moab Ventilator Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: These highly breathable Merrell Moab Ventilator light hikers work hard on all your active warm-weather endeavors. Dura leather/nylon ventilator mesh uppers offer ample breathability, flexibility and support for long-lasting performance. Protective synthetic leather toe bumpers ensure durability and abrasion resistance; heel loops aid in entry. Mesh padded tongue protects instep against lace pressure and enhances breathability. Nylon mesh linings absorb and disperse excess moisture for comfortable feet in hot conditions. Removable 4.5mm footbeds are anatomically shaped; they add cushioning for improved comfort. Q-Form(TM) alignment system provides women a precise anatomical fit for superb, tailored comfort. Full-length, compression-molded EVA midsoles supply cushioning and support for all-day wear. Air Cushion(R) heel pockets enhance shock-absorption under heels and help stabilize footstrike. Nylon arch shanks provide extra stability and support. Vibram(R) Multi-Sport(TM) outsole with Trek and TC1 Dura rubber deliver reliable traction on both wet and dry surfaces.
short_description: These highly breathable Merrell Moab Ventilator light hikers work hard on all your active warm-weather endeavors.
